dict.string:
Forces the Notification Banner to remain visible until one of the following happens...
(1) Banner is manually dismissed (2) Current screen is left (3) Screen dims (4) Device is locked
- This differs from the other two sticky banner patches ("Sticky Banner" & "Van Ner Pls. Stick Around") in the following ways... Tested on an iP6+ 8.4. (7-21-15)
• Actively updates banner content • Banner dismisses itself
● If you enjoy my patches, please consider sending a donation...
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
